questions.question: I asked what ………………………. doing there.
questions.description: In indirect questions we use the normal word order. That means the subject goes before the auxiliary verb.

questions.question: Nobody knows when ………………………. arrive.
questions.description: In indirect questions we use the normal word order. That means the subject goes before the auxiliary verb.

questions.question: I wonder where …………………….. gone.
questions.description: In indirect questions we use the normal word order. That means the subject goes before the auxiliary verb.

questions.question: I can’t figure out what ………………………… do next.
questions.description: In indirect questions we use the normal word order. That means the subject goes before the auxiliary verb.

questions.question: She did not show how annoyed …………………………….
questions.description: In indirect questions we use the normal word order. That means the subject goes before the auxiliary verb.

questions.question: I heard my name ………………………..
questions.description: The past participle is used in this structure.

questions.question: They made the boy ……………………… well.
questions.description: The infinitive is used without to after make.

questions.question: Let me ……………………. now.
questions.description: The infinitive is used without to after let.
